alert.note: Alert for Winston (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 07 at 12:50PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Winston County through 130 PM CDT... At 1250 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Needmore, or near Haleyville. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Haleyville, Double Springs, Houston Recreational Area, Needmore, Moreland, Winston Free State Barn, Ashridge, Smith Lake, Natural Bridge, Weiss, Posey Field Airport, Pebble, Delmar, Sipsey River Rec Area and Grayson. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
